altTitles.vi: Con gái của Công tước Quái Vật

description.en:
- This Title is Pre-Serialization of [<Monster Duke's Daughter>](https://mangadex.org/title/e7b92d8b-ae1d-4968-aab4-de5d62213075)
---
She was cut off from the world until she was 5 years old and she was taken in by her father the "Monster Duke."  
  
One day, I sneaked into father’s study without anybody knowing and discovered a strange book… What’s up with the content? I will die because of a sickness? Then, are you treating your foster daughter well? In the end, I’ll die because I’m sick but it won’t happen before that! Then… I will do whatever I want!  

---
- [Original Web Novel](http://www.joara.com/romancebl/view/book_intro.html?book_code=1429883)

      Author took down the novel to only focus on the Webtoon
description.ko:
- This Title is Pre-Serialization of [<Monster Duke's Daughter>](https://mangadex.org/title/e7b92d8b-ae1d-4968-aab4-de5d62213075)
---
어차피 아파서 죽을 거라면 그 전에는 죽는 일이 안 일어나겠지! 그렇다면...정말 맘대로 해버릴거야!

description.ru:
- This Title is Pre-Serialization of [<Monster Duke's Daughter>](https://mangadex.org/title/e7b92d8b-ae1d-4968-aab4-de5d62213075)
---
Она была отрезана от мира, пока ей не исполнилось 5 лет, и ее забрал отец, «Герцог-монстр». Однажды я незаметно пробрался в кабинет отца и обнаружил странную книгу ... Что с содержанием? Я умру от болезни? Так хорошо ли ты относишься к своей приемной дочери? В конце концов, я умру, потому что я болен, но этого не случится раньше! Тогда ... Я буду делать все, что захочу!

---
- [Original Web Novel](http://www.joara.com/romancebl/view/book_intro.html?book_code=1429883)

      Author took down the novel to only focus on the Webtoon
